extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of 6.0 at  the 200-level or above in GPHY_Physical, or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Methods of measurement and management of environmental data including energy and radiation fluxes, temperature, humidity, wind precipitation, and soil moisture. Practical work involves the design and implementation of a field experiment.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Environmental Measurements: Data Collection and Management
